game.name: Parcel Frenzy: Get To Work!
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Run the warehouse while your boss relaxes on a beach. Sort packages by weight, stack pallets under 60kg, label them, manage power, and deal with failing machines. Everything costs money. Mess up and you’re fined. Keep it running, or the company goes under.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run the warehouse while your boss relaxes on a beach. Sort packages by weight, stack pallets under 60kg, label them, manage power, and deal with failing machines. Everything costs money. Mess up and you’re fined. Keep it running, or the company goes under.
